price: 147. Dit is de Waarheid van jullie Heer. Behoor dus niet bij degenen die twijfelen.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
